Plot: In the Alpine village of Tolzbad in the 1800s, the townsfolk talk quietly and restrain their movements lest they incur avalanches. This atmosphere lends itself to repressed emotions - shown...
Title: Careful
Writer: Guy Maddin (screenplay), George Toles (screenplay), George Toles (story)
Actors: Kyle McCulloch, Gosia Dobrowolska, Sarah Neville, Brent Neale
